changelog: Fixed access rules Swim(), Dive() and WaterCatch() not registering correctly
Changed Icon for WsW "Black pants = Dangerous" mailbox to a Blue Mailbox
Added Lamps option tracking and respective Items in the layout
Added MM Double Door Key tracking
Added tracking of MM new locations "Defeat Jake" and "Rescue Professor"
Fixed : Due to a code error, some Level ER order would cause keys to not detect correctly
Changed code referencing "Crumbling Castle" to now be "crc" instead of "cca" for consistency with the APworld
Corrected Logic for MM
Removed Lamps/Door options for now since it caused some bugs
Fixes to Water Net logic not taking Progressive Water net into account
Fixed ER being weird with the world unlocks while manually clicking the Labels

Changed behavior of ER unlocks : While Entrance randomization is at "Vanilla", no changes in the ER tab will impact the world unlocks. To take into account the ER tab entrances, switch to a value other than "Vanilla"
Removed displaying of Coins in the levels totals : They do not serve any purpose. (They are still tracked in the map)
Split the nodes on the map into 3 different nodes : Monkeys (& bosses) , Specter Coins and Mailboxes
There is now a new global Tab : Overall View. This maps have all levels/locations on it so it is easier to track at once !
Changed Icon for catched monkeys to be the a Net Icon, similar of the one you see in the game's pause menu
(NYI) Added Lamps and MM_Door/Adjusted Logic. Also adjusted logic for MM Donovan and Laura to take into account you can catch them without having the Lamp Item
(NYI) Added an option for future updates : Lamps and MM_Door tracking. Will automatically be disabled (and hidden) if you connect to a seed without them.
Changed Shuffle Water Net Option to reflect changes in APWorld 0.6.4 (off, progressive, on)
Fixed Coral Cave Super Flyer rule error in syntax, causing it to not register correctly
Hopefully fixed the ER "Load from AP" option for the final time
Fixed "Load from AP" setting keys wrongly
Fixed Coral Cave Puddles not having SuperFlyer logic
Added an option to load ER locations only if you have enough key (See "Pack Settings")
Added "Load from AP" option from ER menu to reload Entrances from AP slot_data
Changed AP connection setting default value to "If Logically accessible"
Enabled Bulk Updates in the code to make pack faster
Added Auto-Update for future updates
Added Keys option and modified World Key tracking
Added "Entrance" option and Entrance Randomization tracking (With a Clear and Reset button)
Added "Pack Settings" tab for Auto-set Entrances tracking when connecting to AP (Default is set to "No").
Added tracking of Stadium Attack / Gladiator Attack Coins and keys
Fixed Crumbling Castle coin "Outside" having wrong access rules in all logics
Fixed "Training Room", "Think Clearly" and "Hop in the Tank" Mailboxes not tracking
Corrected layout missmatch
Adjusted the layouts in preparations of Level / Room rando
Added "Shuffle Water Net" option that displays the 'Progressive Water Net' and 'Water Catch' Item in the layout
"World Key" item now has a maximum of 18 to represent the max acquirable keys in the new "Entrance" and "UnlocksPerKey" options
Added the missing Mailbox in WSW
Corrected access rules following apworld logic
Fixed WSW_ThirdRoom and WSW_FourthRoom logic
Added/Fixed logic for CanSwim, CanDive and CanWaterCatch with Water Net Shuffle
Fixed Mailbox tracking being off by some Id's
Corrected Bosses autotracking
Added autotracking of new settings
Autotracking of Mailboxes
Added autotracking of new settings
Updated layout to include Specter 1 and Specter 2
Added Options : Mailboxes, SuperFlyer
Layout adjustement to make rooms for more options (We are starting to have MANY options)
Updated Map scaling to make it better
Added Mailboxes as locations
Revised ALL locations/item logic since it had been reworked in the apworld
Added CCA boss and TVT Boss in the tracking for their respective locations
Verified/updated locations rules based on Net and WaterNet logic
Added Peak Point Matrix as a map location
Fixed Wabi Sabi Wall/Barrel Room Coin not being tracked properly
Fixed Specter's Factory Lava Room Coin not being tracked properly
